mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ta_daily_production (
daily_desc,
daily_type,
proj_id,
working_percent,
working_workload,
daily_status,
sync_id,
remark,
is_del,
week_day,
create_id,
create_time,
update_id,
update_time,
daily_date
)VALUES(
#{daily_desc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{daily_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{proj_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{working_percent, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{working_workload, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{daily_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sync_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{is_del, jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{week_day, jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{create_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{create_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{update_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{update_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{daily_date, jdbcType=DATE}
)
mapper.select: SELECT '2' as type, q.proj_id, IF ( p.task_desc IS NULL, "", p.task_desc ) task_desc FROM ta_task q, ( SELECT o.task_id task_id, o.task_desc task_desc FROM ta_task o ) p WHERE q.task_id = p.task_id AND q.real_begin_time < ADDDATE('${daily_date}',INTERVAL 1 day) AND ( q.real_end_time >= '${daily_date}' or q.real_end_time is null ) AND q.handler_user_id = '${update_id}'
SELECT '3' as type, b.bug_name, b.proj_id FROM qa_bug_manage b WHERE date_format(b.final_deal_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = '${daily_date}' AND b.deal_man = '${update_id}'

SELECT '4' as type, a.theme, a.attende_id, a.proj_id FROM qa_files_manage a, qa_message qa WHERE a.state_flag <> '1' AND a.manage_code = qa.mang_id AND date_format(a.begin_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= '${daily_date}' AND date_format(a.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= '${daily_date}' AND qa.user_id = '${update_id}'

select tap.daily_id, tap.daily_date, tap.daily_desc, tap.daily_type, tap.proj_id, tap.working_percent, tap.working_workload, tap.daily_status, tap.sync_id, tap.remark, tap.create_id, tap.create_time, tap.update_id, tap.update_time, tap.is_del, tap.week_day, bc.proj_name from ta_daily_production tap LEFT JOIN bs_proj_commons bc ON bc.proj_id = tap.proj_id where tap.daily_date = #{daily_date} and tap.create_id= #{update_id}

select daily_date, concat(bc.proj_name,':','
',replace(group_concat(daily_desc), ',', '
'), '
') descc from ta_daily_production LEFT JOIN bs_proj_commons bc ON bc.proj_id = ta_daily_production.proj_id where ta_daily_production.daily_date = #{daily_date} AND ta_daily_production.create_id = #{update_id} group by ta_daily_production.proj_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ta_daily_production (
) VALUES ( #{daily_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{daily_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{daily_desc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daily_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proj_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{working_percent, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{working_workload, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{daily_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sync_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{create_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{update_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{update_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_del, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE ta_daily_production
daily_id = #{daily_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
daily_date = #{daily_date, jdbcType=DATE},
daily_desc = #{daily_desc, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
daily_type = #{daily_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proj_id = #{proj_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
working_percent = #{working_percent, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
working_workload = #{working_workload, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
daily_status = #{daily_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sync_id = #{sync_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
week_day = #{week_day, jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_id = #{create_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{create_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_id = #{update_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{update_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{is_del, jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE daily_id = #{daily_id}

UPDATE ta_daily_production
daily_status = #{daily_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_id = #{update_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{update_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE daily_id = #{daily_id}
mapper.select: SELECT daily_id, daily_date, daily_desc, daily_type, proj_id, working_percent, working_workload, daily_status, sync_id, remark, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, is_del, ( CASE week_day WHEN 'Monday' THEN '星期一' WHEN 'Tuesday' THEN '星期二' WHEN 'Wednesday' THEN '星期三' WHEN 'Thursday' THEN '星期四' WHEN 'Friday' THEN '星期五' WHEN 'Saturday' THEN '星期六' WHEN 'Sunday' THEN '星期日' ELSE week_day END ) AS week_day, DATE_FORMAT(daily_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS m_time FROM `ta_daily_production` WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= daily_date AND update_id =${user_id}
mapper.update: update ta_daily_production set daily_type = #{daily_type}, working_percent = #{working_percent}, daily_desc = #{daily_desc}, update_id = #{update_id}, update_time = sysdate() where ta_daily_production.daily_id=#{daily_id}
mapper.select:
SELECT bpc.`PROJ_ID` AS value, bpc.PROJ_NAME AS display FROM `bs_proj_commons` bpc
,`bs_proj_teams` bpt
WHERE bpc.`STATE` = '1'
and bpt.`state` = '1' and bpt.`PROJ_ID` = bpc.`PROJ_ID` AND bpt.`TEAM_USER_ID`=${team_user_id}
GROUP BY bpc.`PROJ_ID` order by CREATE_TIME desc
select count(*) from ta_daily_production where daily_date = #{daily_date} and create_id = #{update_id}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS aos_rows_ FROM ta_daily_production
mapper.sql: daily_id, daily_date, daily_desc, daily_type, proj_id, working_percent, working_workload, daily_status, sync_id, remark, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, is_del, week_day

ta_daily_production.daily_id, ta_daily_production.daily_date, ta_daily_production.daily_desc, ta_daily_production.daily_type, ta_daily_production.proj_id, ta_daily_production.working_percent, ta_daily_production.working_workload, ta_daily_production.daily_status, ta_daily_production.sync_id, ta_daily_production.remark, ta_daily_production.create_id, ta_daily_production.create_time, ta_daily_production.update_id, ta_daily_production.update_time, ta_daily_production.is_del, ta_daily_production.week_day
